sommary.title: You might feel like you are being really organized
Nested navigation in UIs is a bad idea too, keep things as flat as possible.
Nesting tons of folders in your source code is also not helpful

otherposts.title: Why you don't need more than 3 pieces of clothing
otherposts.description: Et vitae, mollis euismod lobortis blandit amet sed amet. Amet ut amet nisl tortor arcu non id nulla mauris neque nisl magna.

otherposts.title: Why you should cook with your family together everyday
otherposts.description: Rutrum aliquet eros semper nunc. In adipiscing augue sagittis, fermentum donec nunc lacinia. Risus in egestas in orci quam.
